welcome_message_body: Welcome to Belgrade, the vibrant capital of Serbia! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich history, lively nightlife, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Belgrade has to offer.

restaurants.address: 409 W Main St (btwn Jackrabbit Ln & Grogan St), Belgrade, MT 59714

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Batajnica Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by providing their email address.
